column5: We are passsing thru TBay on our way to Armstrong. The Beer Store web site lists the following stores as being open until 10 pm on Friday and Saturday :212 N. CUMBERLAND STREET THUNDER BAY ON 806 RED RIVER ROAD THUNDER BAY ON 310 NORTH MAY STREET THUNDER BAY ON 417 EDWARD STREET N. THUNDER BAY ON 145 WEST GORE STREET THUNDER BAY ONWhich one(s) is/are on my way ? thanks a bunch - will save a few $$ on calls.lobo1
disregard - looks like there is one in Marathon.lobo1

In case you change your mind, we usually stop at the LCBO on Dawson Rd/Hwy 102 near the mall. If you can't find what you want there, just cross Hwy 11 and Dawson becomes Red River Rd. I think that the Beer Store is within a couple of blocks. http://ca.maps.yahoo.com/py/maps.py?...t=&mag=9&off=w
thanks. good to have plan "B". link to map - much appreciated.lobo1
